giuseppe99barchetta/SuggestArr

automates media recommendations and download requests for Jellyfin, Plex, and Emby

View on index

Related repos

  • Generates media recommendations from server libraries using language models
  • Automates media requests from lists
  • TMDB client for movie previews and watchlist management
  • Create TV channels from media on Plex, Jellyfin, or Emby
  • Organizes media libraries using symlinks
  • Self-hosted tracker for movies, TV, games, and books
  • Directory of radio stations across genres
